title: "YASUO USED WINDWALL? BETTER SPAM ALL MY SKILLSHOTS ON IT & THEN COMPLAIN ABOUT IT!"
body: -Every players with their "_Yasuo's Windwall needs nerfs_" threads ever.

replies.body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OxtDg1tCgZk

Boi

> [{quoted}](name=SlayerTay6,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=lfBZcwbf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-10T18:09:11.115+0000)
>
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OxtDg1tCgZk
> 
> Boi

I was stood on the otherside of it, i walked through it to chase yasuo. fired my varus ult at it, boom cooldown. no ultand i swear i wasn't anywhere near the wall, no part of it, clipped it. its just a broken hitbox, that needs to be redone... hate that champ so much when playing an adc
I think that might have been a problem with the hitbox. That or it's our favorite: spaghetti code.
Had a similar incident with Vel'koz E. Have no idea if the projectile just starts really far behind Vel'koz, or if Yasuo's windwall just has a long "tail".
that's ezreal ulti, doing damage only if the animation completly passed through you, and windwall completly deleting it only if it touches it.
Because that totally justifies it.
that doesn't, just explain from a coding point of view how it works while also explaining it's not windwall's fault if ezreal's ulti does damage only when it completly passes through you.
i have seen it stop jinx rockets the same way
Were not bitching about the bug, bitching about how "windwall is supposedly bullshit"

> [{quoted}](name=XTRMN00B1337,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=lfBZcwbf,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-09-10T18:25:12.146+0000)
>
> Were not bitching about the bug, bitching about how "windwall is supposedly bullshit"

because this "bug" is intentional, which riot has said quite a few times before. that why nerf
I've seen this video mentioned about 10 times by now and I have yet to see that "Yasuo bug".

It's the "point it backwards, block anyway" thing. People bitch all the time about it and don't appreciate the fact that the wall spawns inside of him or how small a window of opportunity one has to cast it that way.

...which in this video couldn't have been timed any more perfectly.

Yup. People gotta whine about something, right?

You're talking about Wind Wall's normal use. 

What I have to complain about is when he all-ins, you can't get away, and he throws windwall on top of both of you so you can't even retaliate.

This abuse case needs to be removed. I have no other issues with Wind Wall. 

Maybe make it so an enemy champion touching it destroys it or reduces its duration? Blocks allied projectiles as well so you actually have to use it properly?

Probably too much, but damn something needs to be done about this use of it.
The only time I ever complain about the wall is when they put it up, miraculously, every time I use my **one** poke ability. If I can land a few, I'm fine.
Reminds me of this ahri I faced in lane. Started rqing in chat and called me a scripter after I windwalled every single charm in lane (about 5) was hilarious
I'm glad that this is in the shitposting board. It belongs here.

Wind wall i not only annoying when it destroys your skillshots. The sole fact, that you have to play around it for almost 4 seconds, waiting for it to expire, while your frontline gets destroyed and you can do nothing to help them, unless you pass it and get yourself in position to be instakilled. Can you play around it?  Yes. Is it fun? Hell no. Is it fair? Maybe. Does it FEEL fair? Hell NO!!!

Maybe, you shouldn't have unloaded all your ults at once. And your skillshots. And your {{item:3152}}. Too bad everything was on cd when the teamfight began. That {{champion:54}}'s five man ulti sucked too. {{champion:157}}  did a perfect five man ulti and {{champion:127}}  came in and had another perfect five man ulti. {{champion:157}} cleans up with a penta while {{champion:83}} ends the game.

That was 10 minutes before your post. You have achieved maximum salt.
maybe you shouldn't assume that i hit all my skillshots and actually read what I had written in my post

All I was reading is what i put in mine. You see a broken champ, I see it for what it is, a skilled maneuver that is part of his Kit. All I'm saying is that If you shoot all of your skillshots at once, this is what could happen. Looking back at my post now, I wonder what type of team comp the Yas's team was trying. Prob Liss Mid, Malphite Top, Yasuo JG, and Yorick Supp. Prob with Tristana ADC and you lose every tower before 20 min. Gonna have to try this.

At any rate, my post was to show one of the worst scenarios to be in against a skilled Yasuo. I mean, he could be fed and 1v5 in a minion wave, but that's not the point.

Do not dare to speak out of my mouth: 

> You see a broken champ

do not... even dare... I said Yasuo is annoying and unfun to play. I understand what you like about him, and I couldn't care less. He is annoying when he destroys my projectiles, he is annoying when he dodges my skillshots with his E, he is annoying when I see his Wall is up, so I do not fire my projectiles, waiting for it to decay, he is annoying when his wall is off CD, so I do not fire my projectiles either, knowing he will negate my initiation.
Yeah, I'll just try not to cast anything while playing a Mage for 5 seconds, perfect.

> [{quoted}](name=SnackieCakes,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=lfBZcwbf,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-09-10T18:41:20.829+0000)
>
> Yeah, I'll just try not to cast anything while playing a Mage for 5 seconds, perfect.

Walk away lmfao

> [{quoted}](name=SnackieCakes,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=lfBZcwbf,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-09-10T18:41:20.829+0000)
>
> Yeah, I'll just try not to cast anything while playing a Mage for 5 seconds, perfect.

Yeah well uh.... walk around maybe?

No, I always wait for it to go down before I use my-

Oh wait in those 3.75 seconds he's already killed me.
its the fact that he can cancel the projectile when its on him because the wind wall start from his back and quickly goes trough his body
Inb4 windwall blocking things that have already hit him.
Make windwal breakable1!1!1!1!1!1!
Man you are lucky, these never get on the front page.
so true
